section.name: JGroups-ME - JGroups for J2ME (cell phones and PDAs)
section.p:
JGroups-ME is a port of JGroups for the J2ME architecture, allowing to use JGroups on cell phones and PDAs. The port was done by Mandar Shinde (mandar_123@yahoo.com) in 2003/2004.
More information is available at http://www.jgroups-me.org.
